title: How to Get Waterfall in Pokémon Gold

steps.title: Go to Mahogany Town.
steps.content: Go to Mahogany Town. You can fly to Mahogany town using a Flying-type Pokémon. Make sure you cleared all of the Team Rocket events that happen at Mahogany Town first before proceeding. A man near the exit of Mahogany Town will deny you access until you finish it.

steps.title: Head to the right of the town onto Route 44.
steps.content: Head to the right of the town onto Route 44.

steps.title: Continue going through Route 44 until you see a cave known as the Ice Path.
steps.content: Continue going through Route 44 until you see a cave known as the Ice Path. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Go through Ice Path until you come across an ice puzzle.
steps.content: Go through Ice Path until you come across an ice puzzle. [2] X Research source

steps.title: To get through the first puzzle, get your character near the ice and go forward.
steps.content: To get through the first puzzle, get your character near the ice and go forward. Then go left, forward, right, forward, right, down, left, forwards, left, down, right, down, right, forward, and right.

steps.title: You should then see a Poké Ball laying around there.
steps.content: You should then see a Poké Ball laying around there. That is the HM for Waterfall.

steps.title: To get Waterfall, go right to the first rock you see in the second puzzle, forward, right, down, right, forward, left, down, left, forward, and then right.
steps.content: To get Waterfall, go right to the first rock you see in the second puzzle, forward, right, down, right, forward, left, down, left, forward, and then right. [3] X Research source You should be right next to the Poké Ball. Press down A to pick it up, and congratulations; you successfully obtained Waterfall!
